pages.text: Aubergines are mostly used in the druidic arts for their seeds, which store potent amounts of energy - however, some rituals are only successful when the entire aubergine is used.
Otherwise, they are commonly cooked and eaten, or stuffed with additional vegetables.$(br)Aubergine seeds are found in broken tall grass, and can be planted on any normal farmland.

Some druids speculate that this is because the seeds are in their most potent state while still inside of the fruit - and there are very few druids who wish to carry entire aubergines around in their pockets when the seeds on their own often work just as well.

pages.name: Aubergine
pages.text: Aubergines can additionally be obtained by using Runic Shears on fully grown carrots.
When roasted they have a delicate flavour. With the seeds removed, there is plenty of space to augment the aubergine with more delicious vegetables.
